channel.title: Text-based game w/GUI
channel.description:
I remade a text based game that I found on the mopar forums, with a GUI (and COMPLETELY remade code). If you manage to find a single slip of code I used from him, I will be amazed.
Please download it and try it out, it's pretty self-explanatory. Once you start it, type "help" or "commands". All buttons are fully functional.
If you want the source, I'd be happy to post it.
Link: http://www.mediafire.com/?imzkxypnz2gox96
Original creator's topic: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,476833.0.html
